data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Masraf Ekran覺 Verisi'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_COST_DATA
  as select from    I_DeliveryDocumentItem   as DeliveryItem
    inner join      I_DeliveryDocument       as Delivery    on Delivery.DeliveryDocument = DeliveryItem.DeliveryDocument
    inner join      I_PurchaseOrderItemAPI01 as POItem      on  POItem.PurchaseOrder     = DeliveryItem.PurchaseOrder
                                                            and POItem.PurchaseOrderItem = DeliveryItem.PurchaseOrderItem
    inner join      I_PurchaseOrderAPI01     as PO          on PO.PurchaseOrder = DeliveryItem.PurchaseOrder
    left outer join I_Supplier                              on I_Supplier.Supplier = Delivery.Supplier
    left outer join I_ProductText            as ProductText on  ProductText.Product  = DeliveryItem.Product
                                                            and ProductText.Language = $session.system_language
{
  key DeliveryItem.DeliveryDocument,
  key DeliveryItem.DeliveryDocumentItem,
      DeliveryItem.PurchaseOrder,
      DeliveryItem.PurchaseOrderItem,
      DeliveryItem.Product                as material,
      ProductText.ProductName             as materialtext,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'salesunit'
      DeliveryItem.ActualDeliveryQuantity as deliveryquantity,
      DeliveryItem.DeliveryQuantityUnit   as salesunit,
      Delivery.Supplier                   as vendor,
      I_Supplier.SupplierName             as vendorname,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'unitofmeasure'
      POItem.OrderQuantity,
      POItem.DocumentCurrency,
      DeliveryItem.ProfitCenter,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      POItem.NetPriceAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      POItem.NetAmount             as netvalue,
      POItem.PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit    as unitofmeasure,
      '' as documenttype
//      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'      
      
}

union

select from znft_t_dlv_cus as shipment       
  inner join znft_t_dlvit_cus         as shipment_item on shipment_item.companycode = shipment.companycode  
                                                      and shipment_item.deliverydocument = shipment.deliverydocument
  inner join      I_PurchaseOrderItemAPI01 as POItem      on  POItem.PurchaseOrder     = shipment_item.purchaseorder
                                                          and POItem.PurchaseOrderItem = shipment_item.purchaseorderitem
  inner join      I_PurchaseOrderAPI01     as PO          on PO.PurchaseOrder = shipment_item.purchaseorder
  left outer join I_Supplier                              on I_Supplier.Supplier = PO.Supplier
  left outer join I_ProductText            as ProductText on  ProductText.Product  = POItem.Material
                                                          and ProductText.Language = $session.system_language
{
  key shipment_item.deliverydocument,
  key shipment_item.deliverydocumentitem,
      shipment_item.purchaseorder,
      shipment_item.purchaseorderitem,
      POItem.Material,
      ProductText.ProductName          as materialtext,
      shipment_item.shipquantity       as deliveryquantity,
      shipment_item.quantityunit       as salesunit,
      PO.Supplier as vendor,
      I_Supplier.SupplierName as vendorname,
      POItem.OrderQuantity,
      POItem.DocumentCurrency,
      '' as profitcenter,  
      POItem.NetPriceAmount,  
      //      DeliveryItem.ProfitCenter,
//      shipment_item.netwr              as netvalue,
      POItem.NetAmount             as netvalue,
      POItem.PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit as unitofmeasure,     
      shipment.documenttype
} where shipment.documenttype = '1'
